评论详情: Such a pretty top. Although I plan to wear a white camisole underneath as it's a little see through. It's light , soft and very comfortable.

I like this 3/4 sleeve top! It's great for work and a cute floral fabric. It's soft and fits well. It goes in at the waist and flares a bit by the hips so it's flattering. It was a little tighter in the bust, so if you're large-chested, you might size up unless you like a tighter fit. It was long and looser at the bottom, so it covers any muffin-tops and your behind nicely. Comfortable!
Fits well, but fabric is a little thin. Kept

The top itself is pretty but the fabric is very light weight and stretches easily.  I have been using this as a layering shirt under button shirts.  It is well made with good finished seams. I have washed and dried the shirt with no problems.
I bought three different colors for this brand. The size chart is true to fit and the colors and patterns are great for casual wear and work. I liked the first three so much I ordered two more.

This top is well-made with a finishing stitch, so you’re not gonna have to worry about the Seams unraveling. It’s a nice silky material that has a nice, vibrant pattern and coloring. It’s true to size so order the size that you wear now. It’s long enough it comes down to your hips so it covers any flaws in your tummy area. It washes nicely in the washing machine I hang dry my tops, so I don’t know if it would shrink. It is priced Well for the quality of the product.
Fits well, comfortable, the colors got with so much of my wardrobe  . . . happy camper here!

评论概述: Soft Material, Fits True to Size
评论详情: I ordered the recommended X-Large (but I also measured myself beforehand just to make sure). This shirt fits true to size. It was snug around the mid area though, but that is also user preference. The material is a soft almost silky texture that made it easy to wear. I am someone who is very sensitive to materials in clothes and if there is even a small rough or itchy part, I simply cannot wear it. This shirt did not have that problem. It was light and airy. It did not sit heavy on my shoulders and came down a good length. The only con to this shirt is that it is slightly see through and you need to either wear a nude/white bra or an undershirt. The final thing, which is 100% my personal preference, is that this reminds me of something my mother used to wear. It was a similar style to the majority of her wardrobe, and I personally don't feel that I am ready for this style. It will sit in my closet until I am ready to pull it out and give it another try. That being said, I love the design. The floral print is beautiful, and the pleated top makes it lay nicely over the front. I will be wearing this later down the line or when I find an event that this will be appropriate for. I highly recommend this shirt and think it will be a perfectly added piece to anyone's collection.

The style is the same as in the photos. The color is more muted in the photos, it's brighter in real life. I prefer the color in the photos, but it's still a cute top. It fits me accordingly with the size chart.

I think with this top's neckline and cut, it is a very flattering top.  The fabric is soft and it doesn't wrinkle which makes it great for travel!  I'm considering ordered another in a different pattern.

评论概述: My new FAVORITE top- seriously, I'm obsessed
评论详情: I got this and wore it for a week (not straight, lol) and then ordered 4 more in different colors. So flattering. So comfortable. Washes well. It's really my new favorite top.

This is a lovely shirt-very pretty pattern (white pink floral).  I ordered my regular size and it fits well.  I like the neckline and the pleats which add to the overall look.  Also love the 3/4 length sleeves.  The medium weight material is good for springs and falls.  I washed and dried the shirt--no shrinkage or wrinkling.

I love everything about this shirt. Its in my prefered style, my preferred color, and fits perfectly. The length is great and I like the feel of the material. The material is neither too thin or thick.
Love this shirt. If your a warm natured person this shirt is great for anytime of the year specially winter indoor months. Affordable, comfortable, sized perfect and looks great casual or dressy

I recommend this one for curvy people. The vertical darts are strategic. They fit over your curves in a flattering way. Size large fits true to size. The blue color is great for people with blue eyes.
Super soft and comfortable. Fits great. Nice vibrant colors. Machine washable.

Con el título ya quedan pocas cosas que añadir. Si bien sigue destacándose por una suavidad de la tela, un corte moderno y una confección excelente.  La talla S, no presenta ni estrechez ni holgura, cosa que no sucede con todos los proveedores.  El blanco, no transparenta. Buen producto.

I love this top. The fit is perfect. It came out of the wash with no shrinkage or dye run. The pleating on the bodice and the shape of the neckline are so flattering. I’ve already worn this twice, and will be wearing it again and again.

Love the styling of this top!  The front permanent pleats & V-neck are such cute features.  It's already a winner for me!  I also love the 3/4 length sleeves and tunic styling.  Bright colors in fun busy pattern, yet it allows for dressing up or down because it's so cute!  The material is a polyester/rayon/spandex blend, so it feels good and wears good.  Comfort & fun.  I love it, recommend it, and it has 5 stars from me!

Great price for a casual 3/4 sleeve tunic style top.  Was nervous about the pleating detail as that can be hit or miss for larger bust lines.  This top was cute and flattering.  Fit true to size with soft material that has some stretch but isn’t too clingy.
This shirt is very comfortable, and the pattern on the blue floral is absolutely beautiful. No shrinking after washing and drying, no wrinkles either.
This blouse fits true to size, and is very cozy! I can see myself wearing this pretty frequently. The fabric isn't very see-through, and the color looks just like it is in the photo. Great work!

评论概述: Very nice shirt in a pretty green color
评论详情: This is a super comfortable shirt. The fabric is soft and comfortable, and the fit is as depicted in the listing.  (I am between an M and aL , with a 38D/40C bust--I ended up going with size M and it was perfect).  The green is really nice --the same as the listing but with a little less marling, so I like it even better than the listing image. For the price, you can't go wrong.

评论概述: Soft fabric, well made, unexpectedly bright!
评论详情: The fabric used is wonderful! Silky soft without being shiny, it has a wonderful hand feel & great drape. It even manages to skim lumps & bumps instead of cling. The cut is equally nice, and is flattering even on my chubby hourglass from the front, pregnant from the side build. Will be great paired with jeans! My only complaint is that while the colors of the bohemia floral appear soft & somewhat muted in listing photos, in person they are vivid, bright, and VERY orange! I'll try to add pics in the next few days. If the bohemia floral colors were as soft/muted as they appear in listing photos, this would be an easy 5 star top. Had to ding a star for the unexpectedly bright & vivid orange color that's really in your face. Love everything about this top EXCEPT for the color discrepancy, and would buy another color without hesitation.
I like the length and fit of this blouse, the colors and design are pretty.  This will dress up a pair of jeans nicely.

This is a really cute top. Fits true to size. The fabric is pretty light weight but not see through. Great for warmer months or could be worn with a sweater in colder weather. The color is true to the photographs. Very pleased with this purchase.

评论概述: Very nice fitting with a little bit of stretch
评论详情: This top is soft. It hangs really nicely and it has a small amount of stretch. I ordered down one size as it’s loose fitting, it fits really nicely in the body, but the arms are almost too tight, which is no fault of the shirt sizing is because I ordered down. if you like your shirt, not so loose fitting, order down one size, just be aware if you have bigger arms that the arms may be tight. Overall, it’s a really nice top that is pretty and made well.

评论概述: Stunning blouse, nice fit and comfortable
评论详情: The knit fabric was just the right weight to wear any season except for the hottest days.  The pattern on the fabric was not loud and was stylish with the bodice's stitched pleats. The neckline was cut well and not too deeply.  No buttons to worry with.  The fit was true and the construction of the garment was excellent. no loose strings, unsewn seams, or puckers.  It was very comfortable as I ended up wearing it 8 hours.  I definitely would buy this blouse again.  The only issue I have, which is very minor, is the care tag did not state how this was to be dried....line, low heat, block, etc.  I have to assume hang to dry from the washer.  Five stars.
